name: spotify-menu-bar
title: Spotify Menu Bar
description: A simple extension that shows the current playing song in the menu bar (no login required).
author: goulin_khoge

commands.name: spotify-menu-bar
commands.title: Spotify Menu Bar
commands.description: Show the current playing song in the menu bar.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
